title: Strategic Initiatives in Electron Microscopy Education â€“ Bridging Gaps for a Diverse Community
content: Over the past three years, we have embarked on a transformative journey to enhance diversity and inclusion within the electron microscopy (EM) community. Our efforts introduced three strategic initiatives across various levels of education: undergraduate research projects, international collaborations, and community engagement. These initiatives were tailored to reduce entry barriers in the field of EM, aiming to cultivate a more inclusive and diverse scientific community.
